inn1.comm: on middle and leg, turned fine, loud shout of 'NO!'
fuller on off, some swing there, pushed into the covers, 89mph on that one
wider this time and Trescothick shoulders arms to that one, collection job for the 'keeper
close! This one pitches on middle and off and seams away, he nibbles at it but the ball falls short of Kamran Akmal behind the stumps, a few metres at least
runs now, banged into his ribs and he stands tall and awkwardly plays it down to square, Strauss wants the run and they scamper through

first ball duck! What a ball, great start for Pakistan, he gets this one in the right area, on off, played at and gets a thin edge through to Akmal who makes no mistake. Strauss goes without scoring, and Shoaib has one in his first over.
good start from him, pitched up on off stump and its defended towards point
beauty, shapes away from Trescothick's half-forward prod
fuller on leg, plays at it and gets an outer edge that flies low past second slip and down towards third man
good length on off, defended and the ball trickles to the on side
this one lands on a good spot on off and nips into Bell, strikes him in the midriff area, they steal a leg bye
on middle and leg, tries to work in fine but the fielder swoops in and they resist the single
lifter on off that kicks and has Bell jumping and swaying out of his way
fuller this time and its played back to the bowler
another good ball, didnt do a lot, but it was quick and in a good area, beats Bell's backfoot defense
similar ball but this time Bell is right behind it with better defense and a loud shout of 'NO' back to his partner
shot sir, fuller outside offstump and he just caresses that through the covers, just a push and it speeds away

he opts for a shorter delivery this time around, but Bell easily judges that one and lets it go through to Akmal with a high raise of the arms, Shoaib definitely didnt like being driven through covers for four
good stuff again, lands in that sweet spot around off and has him playing at it half-heartedly, beaten by the movement
slightly shorter on leg, defended towards mid-on
similar ball on leg, this time he tucks it towards square leg but no real chance of a run there
bang on middle and off, hit that short of a length spot and he defends it towards cover-point
impressive line and length, pitched up on middle and leg, defended to the on side
full on off, he drives and gets an edge that bounces just short of Inzamam at first slip, Trescothick not looking at the top of his game here
short outside off, stands tall and daps that throught slips and gulley, they steal a couple, well run
similar ball and he again stands up, this time defended towards point
slower ball, close to a yorker outside off, well picked and pushed to covers
shorter and angling into him, well worked off his hips and around the corner for a single
on off, stands tall and slices towards point, who fields it well
this one drifts onto middle and leg and is pushed back to the bowler
good one, pushed up on a perfect length on off, corridor of uncertainty, Bell pushes at it and his beaten
and again, same spot but some swing away, Bell drives but misses it all ends up
slightly shorter, nips back into him, he plays at it and gets an inside edge between his legs, trickles to the on side
drifts onto the pads and he turns it past square leg for his first boundary, easy pickings that, good shot
on middle and off, gives him the charge but can only drive it back to Asif
full on middle and off, defended
outside off and lifting, sways out of harm's way for Akmal to collect
another bouncer, but moving down leg, Bell ducks and its called a wide
fuller on off, defended towards cover, that was bowled from wide of the crease

wow, that was quick and full on off, Bell drives but is beaten all ends up, ball brushes something but Akmal fails to collect it to his left, ball runs away and they steal one, umpire calls it leg byes, was there bat on that though? Looks like it, according to the replays
fuller on leg stump, tries to flick but misses and the ball scurries to the off side
shorter on middle and leg, bowled again from wide of the crease, gets bat onto it as the ball rolls towards slips

good length ball on off, Tresco stands tall and drives but makes zero contact, a tight over coming to and end, should have had Bell but Akmal dropped another catch to add to his summer's tally of non-takes
right up there on off, played at and the ball rolls to the onside once again, good stuff this from Asif
short and wide, cut hard to point who misfields and allows Bell a single
good ball, better this time, on off and has him defending towards mid-off

and he's gone this time! Full and swinging away from off, Tresco plays at it and the ball flies low and hard to Younis Khan at second slip who makes no mistake. Tresco's iffy innings comes to an end and Asif has a wicket, England are two down, heat's on the home side
beauty, full and seaming away from Pietersen who just pokes at it and makes absolutely no contact, that ball held up just the slightest
similar delivery, but this time he gets a stride forward and shoulders arms, KP not taking a chance with that one, great over from Asif

another one! Shoaib on fire, short of a good length in that zone outside off stump and Bell unleashes the tamest of drives and can only get an edge into the big, safe hands of Inzamam at first slip. That was a poor shot and England are suddenly three down in no time, advantage Pakistan, and how
short of a length on off and moving into him, he stands tall and presents the full face of the bat, good defense there
thats bad, drifting down his pads and its called wide, rightly
that too is very wide outside off stump, and the umpire quickly signals the needful
better, much better, 89mph on that one as it lands outside off and swings away, Collingwood beaten in his checked drive
similar delivery outside off and slight movement in, left alone for the 'keeper, England very defensive now it appears
fuller, much fuller, an attempted yorker on off and he digs it out towards midwicket
wow, wow, great stuff, lands on off and shapes away from Collingwood's prod, this is some fantastic bolwing, no respite for the England batsmen
outside off, no real movement there as he shoulders arms again, ball even kept slightly low for Akmal behind the stumps
this one's a tad further away from offstump, and again KP decides to shoulder arms and leave it
closer to the stumps this time, seams away from outside off...yes, you guessed it, left alone for the 'keeper
this one's on off, KP defends off the back foot, ball flies off the outer edge but only on the bounce to Younis who dives to his right at second slip and saves runs
full on off, defended going forward but gets an edge past the stumps and down towards fine leg, KP off the mark in streaky manner
shorter on middle and leg, up on his toes and tucks it past midwicket
narrowly missed his legs, might have brushed something, not called wide
short of a good length outside off, left alone
quick and angling into him, does well to stand up and turn it around the corner for a single
quick, very quick, a yorker almost which thuds into his pads, but that was going down leg, Shoaib yells out a loud appeal as the batsmen steal a leg bye, that was definitely outside leg stump though
full outside off, just that much slower and its pushed into the cover region
good ball, short of a length on off, driven back to the bowler
fuller this time on off and he drives it into the covers
shorter and moving into him, he gets right behind it and pushes to mid-on and calls for the run
good length on off, pushed to covers, this is a fine spell from Asif
what was that, now? Gives him the charge with a shimmy down the track, tries to get on top of Asif but misses completely as the bounce beats him
bang on target, off stump line, this time he coolly pushes it to off and yells a firm 'NO' to KP
good start, full on off and its defended back to the bowler
slightly shorter, KP down the track and whipping it between square leg and midwicket for a couple, intent shown here against Rana
better ball on off, gets behind it and defends to the covers
short of a length on off, driven into the covers off the backfoot and the batsmen cross for a single
shot, full on the legs and its whipped throught midwicket for four, ball screams away, England have their third boundary
shorter on off and he gets behind it and defends with a full face of the bat, get the name of the maker on that one, anybody?
short on off, an ambitious KP tries to pull it away but mistimes it, the ball rolls to the onside, Asif has a wry smile at the batsman
good ball on middle and off, goes forward to defend but the ball strikes his thigh
on off stump and its pushed to Abdul Razzaq at mid-off off the backfoot, fielder slow to respond and they get a single, good running
full on off and its watchfully played into the cover region
identical delivery, in a good area, and its simply played back to the bowler, no room on offer here from Asif
ends the over with another good ball, on and around off stump and its pushed to cover, exceptional spell from Asif
short of a length on off, but enough for him to push that firmly on the up through covers for four, cracking shot that
too short this time and he stands up and smashes that throught midwicket and mid-off for four, great shot, arrogance personified even
fuller on off and its driven to Shoaib at mid-off who slides and saves run, good work
angled into him from off, he stands up and laps it around the corner for one
good length on off, looks to work it to the onside, ball goes straight to mid-on who moves in to stop it, no run allowed
on off stump, punched to mid-off for a single

gone! Pitched up on off stump, KP unfurls an ugly slog that goes high, high in the air and down towards third man where Rana moves in well and takes a well-judged catch, Asif gets KP another time this summer, that was a needless shot, honestly, and the batsman has much soul-searching to do given his recent comments in the press. England are four down and in some trouble, well bowled Asif
fuller on off, looking for the swing but he gets well and defends it
shorter on middle and off, down on his haunches as it sails over him
full on off again, pushed back to Asif who collects to his left
bang on target yet again, batsman has no option but to play it back to the bowler
good ball on off, well played to the covers
what a start, dropped in short, batsman goes for some sort of pull, he had no real clue to that one as the ball sort of stopped on him, gets an edge over the 'keeper and away for four
short again but angling down leg, called a wide
shorter again but Collingwood has control over it, works it fine for one and the 50 is up for England
fuller and slower on off, defended to the cover region
middle and leg, pushed to mid-on, no call for a run there
short of a good length on off and its pushed to covers off the backfoot
good ball on middle and off, pushed towards mid-on, no run again
a rank half volley on middle stump, nicely put away throught square leg for four, good footwork yields a good shot, pressure on Rana
better ball on off, good length, punched to covers
middle and leg, worked to the left of mid-on where Mohammad Yousuf comes around and cuts off runs
full on middle and off, watchfully defended back to the bowler
shorter this time and its crunched into the covers, straight to the fielder
good ball, outside off and shaping away as the batsman strides forward and drives but is beaten
short on off, stands tall and keeps it down into the off side
shorter, middle and off, well turned into midwicket for runs
better line with just the one slip, outside off and left alone
dragged in shorter on off, he gets up and works it to the onside again, well played and well run
short of a good length on off, turned to midwicket, Dalrymple still not off the mark
full and pushed to mid-on, he sets off at a clip as Yousuf has a shy at the stumps, he just misses, that would have been close
good shot, another half volley on the legs and he works it past midwicket for four
drifts onto the pads, worked fine for a single this time
on off, chopped down in front of point, but says no to the run
full on middle and off, defended towards mid-off, better line this from the bowler
in the slot, slower ball and its lofted high over mid-off, ball goes up in the air but lands over a running fielder and drops before the fence, not well-timed at all
on leg and its lapped around the corner
fullish outside off and left alone for Akmal behind the stumps
good ball on off, goes forward and pushes to cover, no says the batsman to his partn erat the other end
width offered, and its slapped past point, Collingwood always had two on his mind and he gets it alright, well run
full on the pads and its worked throught square for one, Rana in the deep collects and throws it back
short of a length on middle, worked past Yousuf at mid-on who gives chase and stops runs, not the quickest fielder out there, you'd have to say
dropped shorter on middle and off, easily picked over midwicket and with the help of the hill he gets four more to his name, good shot
short on off, stands up and chops it down to the off side
wide outside off, cut well past cover and point for one
fuller on off, defended towards mid-off
slower on off again, played with soft hands to point, no run though
short of a length, played down past gulley for a sharp single
advances down the track, Rana drops it short, defended off the backfoot to the bowler

got 'em! A quick delivery right in front of the stumps, straight as can be, Dalrymple goes for some sort of a drive but makes no contact and is caught stone dead in front of the stumps, umpire Benson's finger goes up in a flash - "you're on your way, son" - and Pakistan have struck to stop this stand in its tracks
full on off, confidently driven with a high arm into the covers, good footwork on that shot too
shorter on off and its guided past gulley for one, Clarke off the mark, he will need a good score after his Cardiff failure
not a good ball, drifts way down the pads and its wide
full on off and its driven back to the bowler who casually stops it to his left
fuller this time on middle and leg, worked around the corner past square leg for one
this one lands outside off and jags back into him, raps the pads but clearly over the stumps, bowler and 'keeper appeal but Benson shakes his head
short of a length on middle and off, tapped to midwicket who moves in and stops
short outside off even as the batsman shimmies down the track, works it past covers for a single
on off, gets the hands down at the last minute and keeps it low past gulley for one
that is quite short and wide outside offstump and its duly called 'wide' by the umpire
right up there on off and has him defending
has a walk down the pitch again but can only defend it to covers
again short of a good length on off, stands tall and plays it down towards the off side
shortish on middle and leg, worked through midwicket
dropped too short on off and its pulled down to mide long-on, huge gap on the onside
short again and its worked into the midwicket region
on off, guided to gulley
better, on off, defended
on off, quicker, but Clarke uses the pace well to glide that past the 'keeper and all the way down to the ropes for four, smart shot there
tossed up on middle and leg, pushed towards mid-on for one
shorter on off, some loop and drift in there as he goes to cut but misses
flighted on middle and leg, worked to mid-on
tossed up on off, advances and drives back towards the bowler
flighted on middle and leg, advances and whips it to mid-on
ever so shorter and he makes room and cuts that behind square, sweeper in the deep does well to come across and stop it at the ropes
looped up on middle and off, defended well
tossed up on off, makes room and drives past covers, mid-off fields it
quicker on off, well forward in defense
good ball on off, some drift there, defended off the front foot
shorter on off, pushed to mid-on off the backfoot, thats the 100 up for England
fuller on middle and leg and its worked to midwicket
tossed up on middle and leg, easily played to mid-on for one
tossed up,moves forward and drives to the covers
wide and he misses out on the cut
short, cut to Razzaq at gulley whose misfield allows easy runs to third man
tossed up and played back to the bowler
on middle and leg, worked to midwicket
on off, drift through the air, Collingwood tries to run it down but misses and the ball hist the pads, but to high, not out says the umpire

but this time he's gone! Straight delivery, stump-to-stump, goes back and is rapped playing for the turn, simple decision from Benson, Collingwood goes in the same fashion as at Cardiff, Afridi strikes
tossed up, quicker too, pushed to cover
there's the indrift again, goes forward and hit on the pads, that was missing leg though
quicker ball, on the pads, worked fine
tossed up, worked towards midwicket who swoops in and fires in a throw at the non-striker's end, good shy but he was home in time
shorter and he goes back and knocks it to midwicket
similar ball and he again works it right to midwicket
tossed up on off, driven to cover
again on middle and off, Read just cant get him away here
tossed up, he advances and gets one to mid-on, good over from Hafeez
full on middle and leg, worked to the fielder
offstump this time, cut straight to point
tossed up on middle and leg, worked past midwicket for a brace
too short this time, he rocks back and smashes that with fast hands and gets four past square leg
fuller on off, smashed through covers for one to retain the strike
full on middle and leg, whipped to midwicket
tossed up again on middle and off, driven to mid-on
dropped shorter, pushed off the backfoot to mid-on
short and across to work it fine
advances and drives to mid-on for one
fired down the leg, batsman out of his crease but Akmal snuffles a take, Afridi not happy
fuller on middle and leg, worked to midwicket
leg stump, worked fine for a single
slower on middle and leg, goes back to work it fine but misses
short on middle and leg but all he can do it work it to midwicket
tossed up, driven to Yousuf at mid-on
tossed up, Clarke advances and smashes that over mid-on for four, good shot
shorter and he drives back to Hafeez
tossed up on off, charges but mis-times the lofted drive down to long-off for one
shorter on middle and leg, worked to mid-on for one, he shies at the stump but gives up an extra run
fuller on off, driven straight to covers
dragged short, hurried onto him, his pull shot goes nowhere but into the ground near his feet
shorter and quicker, down leg, again tries to pull but is struck on the pads, they set off for one as Hafeez has a shy at the stumps
on off, pushed towards the covers
fuller, more of a half volley on middle and off, pushed back to Razzaq who misfields and allows runs down to long-on, Rana there jogging and not realizing that the ball was headed his way
seams into his pads as he looks to heave it away on the leg side, missing leg anyways and the ball trickles towards gulley
full on middle, worked to mid-on for a single
real slow delivery on middle and off foxes him and forces the defensive shot back to the bowler
yorker on off, chipped into the ground before Inzamam at covers
yorker again, dug out to Razzaq at mid-off who moves across and stops
and again, the quick yorker speared into the pads, digs it out as Clarke from the other end sets out, is sent back, Rana shies at the stumps but Clarke's in his way
short, tries to pull but not timed well at all
shot, full on middle and off, deftly sweeps it around the corner and with fine leg up its four runs, cheeky and effective
what a shot! Banged in short first-up and Read is right on top of it, and slams that over deep backward square leg for six, flat and some ten rows back!
quick on off, punched to Inzamam at cover
short of a length on off, makes room to cut but drags it down onto his boot, quick single called for
full and fast, into his legs, Clarke cant do much but get an inside edge through his legs for one
on off again, drives off the back foot to Inzamam at cover again
slower delivery on off, he sees it early and slog-sweeps that over midwicket for four, good stuff this from Read
there's that yorker again, dug out towards gulley for one, this is Clarke's highest ODI score ever
good ball on off, Read looks to slam it through covers but gets an edge along the ground towards gulley, he takes the run
full outside off, tries some sort of paddle shot, struck on the pads outside the line and gets a leg bye towards gulley

gone! Full and straight, you-miss-I-hit and all that....Read goes for an agricultural stroke with midwicket clearly on his mind but fails to make contact and his middle stump goes for a walk, good innings comes to an end, Razzaq has one more to his name at the right time
and he's off the mark, full on off, driven well into covers for one
short of a length on off, well guided past gulley to retain the strike

cleaned up by Shoaib, lethal! Full and fast, Clarke goes for a nothing swish with zero footwork and the ball comes in from offstump and rearranges the furniture to send him back into the hut, but it was a key innings of 39, did England much good you would have to say given the situation
slower ball, sort of a low full toss, strange shot gets him one past point to bring Gough back on strike

cleaned 'em up with that swinging, unplayable yorker! Good pace and the movement in the air has Gough clueless and he loses his stumps, brilliant bowling and Shoaib's running through them here at Lord's, England are nine down
the yorker again but its well dug out to square leg for one, me thinks he saw that one coming
almost a yorker again as Lewis makes room and just gets bat onto it and collects one past gulley and down to third man, that was close, late-cutting Shoaib at 90mph? Whew....
almost, almost, misses the waft and the 'keeper fumbles, they look for the bye and get it, so it will be young Mr. Broad to face the final over

fullish on off, smashed through the covers, they set off even as Younis Khan at covers moves across, collects in a smooth action and lets fire a superd throw at the stumps that gets Broad by a country mile. What fielding, and England blown away for 166 in 39.1 overs, good effort from Pakistan

inn2.comm: almost got him, short of a good length and he draws the edge from Malik but the ball falls inches short of Trescothick at first slip
full on off and defended towards covers
thats not what England need, a no-ball called for overstepping
good ball, a beauty that beats the bat on off
this one nips back into him from off and has him hustling to keep it down
good length on off, plays at it and gets an edge past a diving gulley for one
full, yorker on middle and its driven airily past Clarke at midwicket who gives chase and hauls it in just in front of the ropes
and he starts with a big wide way down the leg side, good take from Read, nerves for the fast bowler
thats it, better, good ball on off nips past the outstretched forward prod
short of a length, back and across and defends back to the bowler

and he's got him, Lewis strikes with a good ball, lands it on the seam, around off and it holds its line to take the thin edge through to Read. Lewis gets his man and England have made an early breakthrough as Hafeez goes
drops this one short to Younis Khan who begins with a firm pull through midwicket for four, off the mark in aggressive style
Lewis strikes with one that lands on off, right on the seam, and draws the thin edge through to Read, Hafeez goes and England have made a breakthrough
banged in short and Younis Khan pulls this well through midwicket to get off the mark in aggressive style
full on off, pushed towards mid-on
full on off, lovely shot with a straight bat past mid-on for runs, decisive front-foot shot that
good length on off, stands up and makes room, pushes it throught point for a brace
this one swings in from off and hits his pads, moving down leg, appeal from Gough is turned down by umpire Benson as the batsmen pinch a leg bye
right up there on off stump, he gets forward and defends
another one seams in from off and raps the pads, loud appeal from all but a firm 'NO' from Doctrove, moving down leg he thinks
fuller on middle and off, defended to the onside
shorter on off, pushed off the backfoot to point
full on off, defended watchfully
again on off and he drives it into the cover region
good stuff, full on off and he's forced to defend carefully, good over from Lewis
good ball on off, pushed to covers
again on off its watchfully defended to the offside
gets some lift from off stump, batsman up on his toes and keeps it down
this one nips in sharply from offstump and catches him clueless, nearly took him in half as Read dives to his left and collects it
good stuff once more, bang on middle and off and he's back and across in his stoic defense
some width there and he slashes at it, leading edge high and down to third man on the bounce
good ball right up there on middle and off, right behind the ball again is Malik
good length, stands tall and punches to cover, a firm 'NO' to Younis at the other end from Malik
a fraction shorter on middle and off, whipped to mid-on where Broad moves across and fields
good fuller ball that swings away and beats Younis' forward drive, firm-footed but makes no contact there
full again of off, this time he pushes with soft hands to cover and wants one, he gets it with some quick running
movement again from Lewis as this one seams back into the right-hander, struck high on the pads
but he wont be getting many if he bowls like that, very wide outside and its duly dispatched past point in fine style, good shot
short again but its crunched to Collingwood at backward point
too short, son, too short, Younis rocks back and pulls that over midwicket with ease, no problems on that shot
better length, around off and moving into him as he leaves it alone
good ball outside off again, not much room offered and its left alone for Read
some width again, and an ambitious Younis goes for a slash but fails to make contact, he's cross with himself
much better length on middle and off, worked to mid-on
shorter, but just a fraction, punched to cover off the backfoot, the bowler moves across and collects
good ball on off, watchfully played to point by Malik

Lewis gets him this time with one that pitches around off, holds its line, and forces Malik to come forward, that ball was not full enough for him to be driving at, and the result is the thinnest of edges through to Read, who gets his second catch, and Pakistan are two down
full and swinging down leg, Yousuf falls over in his stride and is rapped on the front leg but that was missing leg anyways, a muted appeal from the bowler
good ball, nips in from off as the batsman moves across and taps it towards midwicket
shortish on off, stands tall and punches towards point
angled down the legs, clips the pads and runs away for four runs, lo and behold, the umpire calls a 'dead ball' to which Yousuf gapes back in amazement, that was a definite leg glance from him
short on off and he gets back and defends to the bowler
bad, bad ball way down the leg side from Broad, poor stuff
fuller outside off and he pushes it on the rise towards mid-on
seams in from off, delivered from wide of the crease, Yousuf hops and plays back to Broad

oh no, a no-ball denies Lewis a third, he landed one in a good spot on off and drew Younis into a loose drive which Read takes diving to his right, but umpire Doctrove says he over-stepped, but thats a very harsh call
full on off and defended
excellent ball that lands on off and seams away from Younis' forward prod
good length outside off, pushed to covers
smack on target and Younis is forced to stand up and play it back to the bowler
some swing on this one, which is fuller, but its played well and kept down to point
width offered but its chopped weakly to point by Yousuf, Broad struggling still
fuller, some movement, goes for a drive but the ball runs to midwicket, they get a single anyway
too, too short, wrong length from the wayward Broad and Younis stands up and whirls a supreme cut past point for four, great shot
good comeback from the kid, who shapes this one into the batsman and has him hopping and missing in his crease
fuller on off, better length, Younis forward in defense, inside edge past the boot
lands outside off and moves in as Younis ignores it
a beauty outside off beats the forward drive and Read collects, thats the length Broad should be getting at
good ball on off, played down with soft hands to gulley
another good ball on that offstump channel has him shouldering arms
and again, a superb delivery on off shapes away from the bat, how close was that?
bang on target, Yousuf gets down and plays it back to Lewis
slightly more of a middle and leg line has him playing across to mid-on, tidy over comes to an end, Lewis should be an inspiration for his fellow bowlers out there
thats the length, off stump, and its watchfully defended back to Gough
oops, that one's dropped in short and Younis' eyes light up as he swivels and pulls that handsomely over midwicket, one bounce into the ropes
slower and fuller and its defended back carefully, good comeback but Younis too good here
width offered but he mis-times the cut shot into the ground
fuller outside off, gets a good stride forward and eases it straight to backward point
on off, not much room but its left alone
middle and leg, looks to work it fine but misses and they steal a legbye past square leg
marginally shorter outside off, cut hard but straight to point
shapes in from off and its defended back to Lewis
good stuff this, sweet length on off, carefully played out to covers
not enough room to cut but Younis makes it to glide this to backward point
full on off, played with his head firmly down
fuller on off and Yousuf walks into the shot, driven to mid-off
landed in that good spot once again, and the batsman can only play to cover-point
this one's finer and its helped along its way down to fine leg
close, not enough room there but Younis tries to glide it fine, misses the edge by a whisker as Read collects, needless stroke there
quicker and fuller on off, well defended into the covers, better approach from Younis
short of a length, Younis solidly behind that one
full on middle and leg, pushed towards mid-on and they set off, Bell swoops in from midwicket and hits the nonstriker's end but he was in safely
full on off stump, defended back to the bowler
slightly shorter on off, stands tall and pushes to point
impressive length again, admirably straight ball has him back in defense

good ball again on off, he makes room and pushes off the backfoot towards cover-point, Kevin Pietersen dives and saves run, Lewis' impressive spell comes to and end, he's only given 11 runs for his two wickets
full on middle and off, goes for a drive but only gets an inside edge past leg stump and down to Lewis at fine leg

fractionally short outside off, stands up and punches throught covers, Pietersen and Bell give chase and the latter just hauls that in at the ropes, umpires go upstairs and its decreed that he stopped it safely
shot, fuller on off and a flowing drive through the covers get him four, cracking shot
even better! Not as full this time but a lovely square drive leaves the fielders standing as the ball reaches the ropes, thats two fine shots in two balls from Yousuf, who seems to have awoken now
on off, played towards gulley
full on off, driven through covers to the sweeper in the deep
and he begins with a wide ball thats cut past point for a couple
nippy delivery on middle and leg has him back and across in defense
shorter on off and its punched with a high arm into covers
similar ball, this one is guided past Yardy at gulley for a single
great shot, no chance for the outfield to cut it off, fullish ball outside off is smacked through covers for four, great stroke
nips in from off and almost finds its way through Younis' defense, inside edge misses leg stump
full on off, pushed into covers
on off, played to cover
a good yorker, well dug out back to the bowler
slightly short, pushed to point off the backfoot
full on the pads and its chipped over square leg for a single
good ball on off, stands tall and manages to keep it down, ball rolls past his boot
width offered but its only cut to Strauss at backward point
slashes at one outside off and gets a thick edge in the air past where gulley would have been
middle and leg, worked towards midwicket
good ball, bang on off, watchfully defended
slower outside off, and the inelegant side of Younis comes out with a crude swipe across the line to midwicket, needless, really
full on middle and off and its driven to Lewis at mid-on who does very well to stop it
tremendous shot, banged in short and he swivels yet again and slams that hight over midwicket, punishes it and gets his seventh four, great shot
needless no-ball does England's cause no good
banged in short again and Younis loves those, he gets back in a flash and slams one more over mid-on for four more, fine innings this from him
comeback delivery has him playing it down and back to the bowler
short of a good length on off, played to point
slower ball outside off is pushed into the covers
slower ball, almost a yorker, pushed back to the bowler
full on middle and leg, pushed to mid-on
slower, looping ball outside off, guided to Strauss at point
good ball on off, played to covers
slower on middle and leg, worked in the air towards midwicket
slow again on leg, goes for the sweep as the ball moves down the pads
room offered and pushed back point
width there but he misses the cut shot once again
in the slot outside off and he drives it elegantly throught covers, man in the deep stops the four but the batsman get three
short ball, goes for a pull but not timed well, ball lobs up and lands safely in front of wide long-on, they scamper through for two runs
full on off and driven to covers
full on middle and off, punched to mid-on
good ball on off, played down comfortably
pushed into the covers
again on off and again pushed into the covers
width offered and its cut down to Bell at third man
short again and the same shot is drawn down to Bell once more
shortish on middle and leg, easily worked around the corner past square leg for a couple that take Younis to yet another ODI fifty, impressive innings from him
fuller on off, punched into the covers for a single, thats the 100 for Pakistan
slower ball on middle and leg, worked fine
on middle and leg, pushed to midwicket
on off and its caressed into the covers
slower delivery on off, punched to mid-off and they steal a quick run
fullish and its slammed throught covers for two
better ball, no room and its defended
slower halfvolley on off is punched to mid-on
close, full on off beats the edge and sneaks past Read and the stumps, they get a bye for that
full on off, pushed to covers
attempted yorker swings into the pads, but he gets one fine around the corner
slower and on off, driven to mid-off

Clarke strikes! That was a half volley on middle and leg, Younis hits it with the breeze, picks it off the legs and the bail sails high and fast down towards deep midwicket, looks destined for six but Pietersen in the deep takes a good catch right on the ropes! That was agonizingly close to the ropes but KP held his nerve to hold the catch, Younis departs for a fine innings, is this a breakthrough England can build on?
fuller ball on the stumos, plays at it but bad timing results in an inside edge past leg stump
width there outside off but he makes no contact
on off, gets down and glides it past gulley for a leisurely single
on middle and off, falls over as he defends to the onside
leg side, flicked for one past square leg
short and wide, cut past backward point and they get three runs, Inzy runs his runs hard this time
strays onto the pads, another no-ball, and its lapped fine off the legs
on off, straighter one beats Inzamam's waft
middle and leg, worked to midwicket
on off, worked down past point for one
on the  pads and its flicked past square leg for another easy run
full on off stump and its punched back to the bowler
good length ball, stands up and works it towards point
slower yorker is negotiated for easy runs through midwicket
good ball pitched on off and nips back into him
width and its cut down to Trescothick at third man, they get an easy two
fuller on middle and off, pushed to mid-on
in the slot, majestically caressed  between bowler and the stumps for four, good shot from the big man
slower on off, goes for a cut but fails to make contact
eases onto the pads and he has zero issues just working that past Bell at midwicket for three, well played and well run
full outside off and he pushes that into the covers and calls for a run, this is easy stuff for Pakistan despite the bad light
outside off and its guided down to third man
short of a good length, pushed into the covers, easy single taken
short again and he stands tall and punches throught covers, both batsmen look very content at the moment, no bothering them is there?
on middle and leg, eased to midwicket
short and not much pace on it, pulled fine for a single
on middle and off, gets a stride forward and flicks in the air between midwicket and mid-off for another three, no troubling Inzamam here!
on off and its guided towards gulley
full on off, pushed to covers
eased into the legs and he has no problems working it fine again
short ball and its banged through square leg for a single
good length on the stumps, watchfully played back
short of a good length, pushed into the covers
its dark, but Inzamam can see this ball just fine, its banged in slightly short and he sees  it early and slams it over midwicket for four, the fielders didnt see it at all!
and again, on middle and off, a fine flick of the wrists sends the ball over square leg for four more, top shot in the gloom
shorter and he mis-times the pull through midwicket, Inzamam settles for the single
on off, worked through point
width offered on off and its slashed past point for another run
slower on off, pushed to mid-off and Inzamam puts the pressure on the fielder as he sprints throught for a run
on middle and leg and its worked past the man at midwicket, good calling from Inzamam there
shortish outside off and slapped down past gulley again
legside ball is worked off the pads for one
bang, bang, lofted off the legs imperiously and the big man moves to 37 with a shot over mid-off four another four, no stopping Inzamam
four more to Inzamam, in lucky style! Flashes hard at one on off, leading edge flies to Gough at third man who cant see a thing in the gloom and drops the catch, and gives away four runs
middle and leg and its whipped through square and they can get a run easily in this gloom, well run
full outside off, moves forward and is rapped on the pads, loud appeal is rightly turned down
full on off, played to mid-off
slower ball on middle and off is worked through midwicket
slow yorker on off is punched to point
fuller on off, driven into the cover region

thats it, all over, in the slot outside off and its lazily driven through the covers for four to seal the deal! Its been an overcast, gloomy day but Pakistan have outclassed England with bat and ball. Chasing 167 to win, they reached home with seven wickets to spare, key knock from Younis, Yousuf and Inzamam worth their weight in gold, and Pakistan take a 1-0 series lead
